archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Tilgangsstyring/access management
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Axelos common glossary: The process responsible for allowing users to make use of IT services, data or other assets. Access management helps to protect the confidentiality, integrity and availability of assets by ensuring that only authorized users are able to access or modify them. Access management implements the policies of information security management and is sometimes referred to as rights management or identity management.
